resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

• You have to use facial expressions, gestures or dancing to explain to your teammates in 1 minute the word on the phone screen, without making a sound. 

• As soon as your team guesses the word, press "Croco". 

 • You can skip the word by pressing "Skip". 

• To pass the initiative to the other team early, press "Stop". 

 • The team with the most points wins. 

 

 Authors: Anvar Tliamov
